com.fluidops.iwb.ajax
Class StatementInputHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.fluidops.iwb.ajax.StatementInputHelper

public class StatementInputHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Class defining help methods for intelligent statement input creation and guessing, e.g. based on predicate and underlying ontology.

Author:
msc

Method Detail

guessStatementInput

public static FStatementInput guessStatementInput(java.lang.String id,
                                                  org.openrdf.model.Resource s,
                                                  org.openrdf.model.URI p,
                                                  org.openrdf.model.Value o,
                                                  boolean deletable)
Retrieves a suited statement input for the given statement (or statement fraction) based on the current selection. Should be extended once new statement input widgets are available.

Parameters:
id - FComponent id
s - the input form subject
p - the input form predicate
o - the input form object
deletable - whether or not the statement is deletable
Returns:
the statement input form

guessUndecoratedStatementInput

public static FStatementInput guessUndecoratedStatementInput(java.lang.String id,
                                                             org.openrdf.model.Resource s,
                                                             org.openrdf.model.URI p,
                                                             org.openrdf.model.Value o)
As guessStatementInput(), but returns an FStatementInput with no labels or linked icons at all (no predicate label, no delete icon, no page link icon)

Parameters:
id - FComponent id
s - the input form subject
p - the input form predicate
o - the input form object
Returns:
Requested FStatementInput, or null

getStatementInput

public static FStatementInput getStatementInput(java.lang.String id,
                                                org.openrdf.model.Resource s,
                                                org.openrdf.model.URI p,
                                                org.openrdf.model.Value o,
                                                boolean deletable,
                                                StatementInputHelper.FieldType type,
                                                java.lang.String query,
                                                java.util.List<org.openrdf.model.Value> values,
                                                org.openrdf.repository.Repository rep)
Retrieves a statement input for the given statement (or statement fraction) and the specified field type. If type==FieldType.ONTOLOGY, the type (either FieldType.LITERAL or FieldType.URI) is inferred from the ontology (using URI as a default).

Parameters:
id -
s - the input form subject
p - the input form predicate
o - the input form object
deletable - whether or not the statement is deletable
query - a query used for suggestion (may be null)
values - a list of values for suggestion (may be null)
rep - the repository over which the input works
Returns:
the statement input form

literalInput

public static FLiteralStatementInput literalInput(java.lang.String id,
                                                  org.openrdf.model.Resource s,
                                                  org.openrdf.model.URI p,
                                                  org.openrdf.model.Value o,
                                                  boolean deletable,
                                                  FLiteralStatementInput.LiteralType type)
Returns a literal input form for the given configuration. May return null if the configuration is invalid (e.g., the passed object is a URI).

Parameters:
id - FComponent ID
s - the input form subject (may not be null)
p - the input form predicate (may be null)
o - the input form object (may be null, but if !=null must be a Literal)
deletable - whether or not the form is deletable
Returns:
the constructed input form or null, if construction fails

undecoratedLiteralInput

public static FLiteralStatementInput undecoratedLiteralInput(java.lang.String id,
                                                             org.openrdf.model.Resource s,
                                                             org.openrdf.model.URI p,
                                                             org.openrdf.model.Value o,
                                                             FLiteralStatementInput.LiteralType type)
Same as literalInput(), but returns a FLiteralStatementInput without any icon buttons or labels.

Parameters:
id - FComponent ID
s - the input form subject (may not be null)
p - the input form predicate (may be null)
o - the input form object (may be null, but if !=null must be a Literal)
deletable - whether or not the form is deletable
Returns:
the constructed input form or null, if construction fails

comboboxInput

public static FStatementInput comboboxInput(java.lang.String id,
                                            org.openrdf.model.Resource s,
                                            org.openrdf.model.URI p,
                                            org.openrdf.model.Value o,
                                            boolean deletable,
                                            java.lang.String query,
                                            java.util.List<org.openrdf.model.Value> values,
                                            org.openrdf.repository.Repository rep)
Returns a dropdown-based input form for the given configuration. May return null if the configuration is invalid.

Parameters:
id - FComponent ID
s - the input form subject (may not be null)
p - the input form predicate (may be null)
o - the input form object (may be null, but if !=null must be a URI)
deletable - whether or not the form is deletable
rep - the repository over which the input works
Returns:
the constructed input form or null, if construction fails

saveStatementInputs

public static Context saveStatementInputs(org.openrdf.repository.Repository rep,
                                          java.util.List<org.openrdf.model.Statement> addStmts,
                                          java.util.List<org.openrdf.model.Statement> remStmts,
                                          java.util.List<com.fluidops.util.Pair<org.openrdf.model.Statement,org.openrdf.model.Statement>> changeList,
                                          Context.ContextLabel contextLabel)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
Convenience method to save a list of input statement into a new context, while deleting old statement that have become invalid (e.g. because they have been deleted or changed in some FStatementInput field).

Parameters:
rep - the repository in which the changes will be saved
addStmts - the statements to add
remStmts - the statements to remove
changeList - the statements that have changed value
addStmts - the FInputStatements to save
userContext - type of the context to create the statement in
Returns:
The newly created context holding all changes.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - containing a HTML string describing the problems, the caller should make sure to propagate this message to the user
